OpenSim::AbstractTransformAxis

AbstractTransformAxis Class Reference

#include <AbstractTransformAxis.h>

Inheritance diagram for AbstractTransformAxis:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A base class that specifies the interface for a SIMM dof (a "potential" degree of freedom in a joint).

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0

Public Types

enum  MotionType { Translational, Rotational }
